an4.137:1.1: “Mendicants, these four individuals are found in the world.
an4.137:1.3: One individual doesn’t value or submit to ethics, immersion, or wisdom.
an4.137:2.1: One individual values and submits to ethics, but not to immersion or wisdom.
an4.137:3.1: One individual values and submits to ethics and immersion, but not wisdom.
an4.137:4.1: One individual values and submits to ethics, immersion, and wisdom.
an4.137:4.2: These are the four individuals found in the world.”
